EmailTemplate.name: Haul Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome from ACV Transportation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
I wanted to reach out to you personally and thank you for your interest in hauling for ACV Auctions. Your information has been received and one of my team members will be contacting you shortly.
In the interim, if you have any questions please call us at 1-800-553-4070, Option #1.
Sincerely,
Matt Majewski Transportation Team Lead mmajewski@acvauctions.com
